title: Refactor smtpads use z.discriminatedUnion for type safety

title: Refactor platedhole use z.discriminatedUnion for type safety
description: Replaces z.union with z.discriminatedUnion for improved type safety in plated hole properties, ensuring shape is required for all variants.
body:
fix #204 
- Replaced z.union([...]) with z.discriminatedUnion("shape", [...]).
- Made shape required in all variants, including "circular_hole_with_rect_pad". 
- Ensured compatibility with existing TypeScript types and validation refinements
